entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
